text:
Hey all! We picked up a client that connected their HS portal to Shopify. They want to move forward and put a new version of their site on HubSpot CMS.

Question: How can we interact w/ this data via the Design Manager/templates etc? Do we get some sort of global `products` variable or something?
may be worth cross-posting this in <#CGM4KH8KG|ecommerce-bridge> and <#C2YHAHB6K|api>
I think the best way to that is the `crm_objects` function <https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions>

<@UJDVA03L1> done!

<@UFBNA9K9A> I didn't know about that hubl function, now I'm thinking about all the places where that would have helped in the past :man-facepalming::skin-tone-2:
It’s relatively new, so don’t feel bad about not knowing about!
